description.value:
You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Double Shot] is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.
